name: Crazy Dancing Ball
description:
Here comes the amazingly latest pinball game for all of your pinball carvings! Tap anywhere of screen to control the balls smartly in order to complete the target before you run out of time. Come and join the game

Features:
- Great physics engine
- Addictive game play
- swipe skee-ball motion for shooting
- Throw the ball into hole and increase your score.
- Each hole has different scores.
- Used Friendly User Interface.
